description: Count of people based on the mid-year (30 June) estimates of the usual resident population for the 2016 electoral wards.

description: Percentage of people based on the mid-year (30 June) estimates of the usual resident population for the 2016 electoral wards.

description: Percentage of people based on the mid-year (30 June) estimates of the usual resident population for the 2016 electoral wards.
Median age (value at which half the population is older and half is younger). Based on the mid-year (30 June) estimates of the usual resident population for the 2016 electoral wards.

Number of people aged 65 or over expressed as a percentage of the labour force (those people aged 15 - 64). Based on mid-year (30 June) estimates of the usual resident population for the 2016 electoral wards.

Percentage change in the population based on the mid-year (30 June) estimates of the usual resident population for 2007 and 2017. Based on the 2016 electoral wards which were the same in Trafford in 2007.
Number of people per square kilometre. Based on mid-year (30 June) estimates of the usual resident population for the 2016 electoral wards.
Percentage of people identifying their ethnic group as anything other than white. Estimates as at census day, 27 March 2011.

indicator: No people in household have English as a main language
description: Percentage of households who do not speak English as their main language. Estimates as at census day, 27 March 2011.
Percentage of households where all household members have the same ethnic group. Estimates as at census day, 27 March 2011.
Percentage of people whose country of birth was inside the European Union but outside the United Kingdom. Estimates as at census day, 27 March 2011.
Percentage of people indicating that they do not have any religious belief or affiliation. Estimates as at census day, 27 March 2011.
